title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday

Save on some of the best tech on the market with these deals. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Happy Monday! If you're lucky enough to have the day off, that mean you probably have some free time on your hands. Why not spend it online shopping? Thankfully, there are some great deals happening today on Amazon, which means you don't have to spend too much to get a great product. There are price drops on robot vacuums, Halloween candy, and Fire TV Sticks that we've personally tested and tracked, so you can rest easy knowing you're getting a great deal.

1. $80 off: A robot vacuum to do your dirty work

Keep things tidy with a smart robot vacuum at a great price. (Photo: Eufy)

Vacuuming is one of the most annoying and tedious chores—but you have to do it every single day if you really want clean floors. Unless you have a robot vacuum, that is. These nifty 'bots keep things nice and tidy in between deep cleanings. The Eufy Robovac 15C is an inexpensive version of one of our favorite smart robot vacuums, the Robovac 30C, and right now it's even more affordable with $80 off for today only. When we tested this model, we found that it had good dirt pickup and is a highly affordable smart vacuum that's Alexa compatible. It does have some slow cleaning cycles, but for this price, we think it's worth it.

Get the Eufy Robovac 15C for $169.99 (Save $80)

2. Up to 25% off: Your favorite Halloween candy

Save big on your favorite candy—just in time for Halloween. (Photo: Mars)

When it comes to getting candy to hand out to trick-or-treaters (or for yourself), you're going to want to have a good mix. I'm talking Twix, Snickers, Milky, Starburst, and more for grubby ghouls to grab from your bowl. Right now, you can save up to 25% on these Mars Candy mixes as part of Amazon Deal of the Day, making it a great time to stock up on sweets before the big holiday.

Save up to 25% on Mars Halloween candy

3. $15 off: A 4K streaming stick

Get your fall TV on your TV at a great price. (Photo: Amazon)

The Fire Stick 4K is the replacement to the original Fire TV, which is one of our favorite media streaming devices. It has 4K, Dolby, and HDR, and it comes with an all-new Alexa voice remote that controls a number of different features. You can also stream all your favorite shows, movies, and other content just like you can with the Fire TV. Right now, you can get it for $15 off, which is a steal for streaming your favorite fall TV.

Get the Fire TV Stick 4K for $34.99 (Save $15)

4. $50 off: The best checked luggage we've ever tested

Travel like a pro with the best suitcase. (Photo: Reviewed / Seamus Bellamy)

This holiday season, you're going to want a solid suitcase for your road trips visiting family and some TLC for yourself. The Travelpro Platinum Magna 2 is the best checked luggage we've ever tested because it's lightweight, has plenty of packing space, and most importantly, is easy to roll through the airport. Right now, you can get the 29-inch version for $50 off, so you can save a bit and spend more on your actual trip.

Get the Travelpro Platinum Magna 2 Suitcase, 29-in for $278.44 (Save $49.14)

5. Lowest price: A popular tracker for forgetful folks

Keep track of your phone, keys, and wallet with the Tile. (Photo: Tile)

We love the Tile Mate, a small tracking device that you can attach to your most important—or most often forgotten—personal items. You can use an app on your phone to track your Tiles and ding them to find them when you've inevitably lost them. Right now, you can get one for its second lowest price, or a 4-pack for its lowest price ever.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
